name: Aoi Artstyle LoRA (Semi-Realistic)
description:
Aoi Artstyle LoRA (Semi-Realistic)

Use Cases

The LoRA is in itself very compatible with the most diverse model. However, it is most effective when used with Kenshi or AbyssOrangeMix2.

The LoRA itself was trained with the token: skistyle.

For best resulst and replica of the artstyle, use Kenshi for this LoRA!

The models mentioned right now

  1. AbyssOrangeMix2_hard or AbyssOrangeMix2_sfw from WarriorMama777

  2. Kenshi Model from Luna

Strength

I would personally use these strength with the assosiated model:

  • 0.85-1 for AbyssOrangeMix2 - Use 3d in negatives!

  • 0.8-1 for Kenshi

Disclaimer

I still use the LoRA extension personally, since I prefer it. So if you try to recreate the preview images, please use the following extension: extension
